name: reprocessing
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
an industrial process that used material is put through so that it can be used again: waste/plutonium reprocessing Rising costs and stricter regulations made reprocessing inefficient. See
reprocess
More examplesFewer examplesthe spread of reprocessing technologyThe freighter was loaded with nuclear waste bound for reprocessing facilities in Europe.They opposed any new nations from operating enrichment or reprocessing facilities.

the process of dealing with waste materials so that they can be used again: There's a growing market in reprocessing. The reprocessing of nuclear fuel will soon come to an end. a reprocessing plant/works/facility Compare
